name: sharpen
effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Reduces the polygon count
and raises ATTACK.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Reduces the polygon count
and raises ATTACK.

Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
